properties.name: app.delete-reply-executor-pool-size
properties.description: Delete reply thread executor pool size. Putting a small number will cause delayed deletion of replies. Putting a large number will impact system performance on burst deletion requests and deleting a large numbers of replies.

properties.name: app.authentication.rsa-key-alive-hours
properties.description: RSA key alive hours where used for issuing access tokens. Putting a small number increases security but burdens CPU. Putting a large number decreases security but let CPU works less.

properties.name: app.authentication.auth-token-alive-secs
properties.description: Lifespan in seconds of access token. Similar to RSA key alive hours, this value has tradeoffs between security and performance.

properties.name: app.authentication.refresh-token-alive-days
properties.description: Lifespan in days of refresh token. If a user not using service longer than this days, their login status is cleared and they must reauthenticate.

properties.name: app.authentication.token-issuer
properties.description: Name of token issuer of issued JWTs for validation.
